title: If annie was a pokemon
body:
[](http://lol.esportspedia.com/w/images/thumb/d/dd/Annie_0.jpg/200px-Annie_0.jpg)
She would be a smoochum
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/tfbnebs/images/5/54/Smoochum.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140611102506
Because she is a little girl with psychic control of an element.
Bonus
Tibbers is an ursaring
https://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lxpsip82911qd87hlo1_500.gif
Obviously

replies.body: I almost chose braixen until I remembered about smoochum, fitting theme is important, and between the two I thought smoochum fit better than braixen or fennekin at being a little girl.
